abilities.name: Gathering Fire
abilities.description: Innate: Karma reduces  Mantra's  cooldown by 2 / 3 / 4 (based on level) seconds every time she damages an enemy  champion with an ability, or by 1 / 1.5 / 2 (based on level) with her basic attacks on-hit.
descriptions: Innate: Karma reduces  Mantra's  cooldown by 2 / 3 / 4 (based on level) seconds every time she damages an enemy  champion with an ability, or by 1 / 1.5 / 2 (based on level) with her basic attacks on-hit.

abilities.name: Inner Flame
abilities.description: Active: Karma fires a burst of spiritual energy in the target direction that detonates with the first enemy hit, dealing magic damage to all enemies around the target and  slowing affected enemies by 35% for 1.5 seconds.
descriptions: Active: Karma fires a burst of spiritual energy in the target direction that detonates with the first enemy hit, dealing magic damage to all enemies around the target and  slowing affected enemies by 35% for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Focused Resolve
abilities.description: Active: Karma exerts her will over the target enemy champion or monster, dealing them magic damage and forming a  tether between them and her for up to 2 seconds, during which the target is  revealed.
levelings:
Total Magic Damage:80 / 130 / 180 / 230 / 280 (+ 90% AP)
Root and Reveal Duration:1.4 / 1.55 / 1.7 / 1.85 / 2
descriptions: Active: Karma exerts her will over the target enemy champion or monster, dealing them magic damage and forming a  tether between them and her for up to 2 seconds, during which the target is  revealed.
If the tether persists for the duration, the target is dealt the same magic damage and is  revealed and  rooted for a duration.

abilities.name: Inspire
abilities.description: Active: Karma  shields the target allied  champion or herself for 2.5 seconds, granting the target  bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds.
descriptions: Active: Karma  shields the target allied  champion or herself for 2.5 seconds, granting the target  bonus movement speed for 1.5 seconds.

abilities.name: Mantra
abilities.description: Active: Karma empowers her next basic ability within 8 seconds for an additional effect.
descriptions: Active: Karma empowers her next basic ability within 8 seconds for an additional effect.
Karma begins the game with one rank in Mantra.
Mantra can be used while affected by  crowd control.

name: Karma
title: the Enlightened One
blurb: No mortal exemplifies the spiritual traditions of Ionia more than Karma. She is the living embodiment of an ancient soul reincarnated countless times, carrying all her accumulated memories into each new life, and blessed with power that few can...
